Package de.smits_net.games.framework.board

Main window and game board.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    Base class for the game board.
    MainWindow
    Main Window of the game.

Package de.smits_net.games.framework.board Description

Main window and game board. Every game written with this framework consists of a main window and an area inside this window where the game graphics is shown. This package contains the two classes required to realize the board and display the game main window.

To write your own game you have to subclass MainWindow and Board. Your instance of MainWindow should contain the main method and it creates the instance of the Board you are using.

An example how to start the game is found in the documentation of the class MainWindow.
